about_the_game:
NEONPIXEL: Mega Classic set includes two packs.

The first pack, called OLD WORLD 1800S PACK, takes you back to the 1800s, when trade was mainly done by sea and different powers competed for treasures. You can create small harbors and undiscovered islands with the assets provided in this pack.

The second pack, STEAMPUNK PACK, is not as extensive, but it still offers enough assets to create intriguing places that emanate the scent of steam and industry or are illuminated with vegetation!

Contents

--OLD WORLD 1800S PACK--

characters:26 sheet

tilesets:33 sheet

　parallaxes:2 sheet

--STEAMPUNK PACK--

characters:47 sheet

tilesets: 10 sheet

　parallaxes:4 sheet

●Update 2024/1/25

Upgrades to Old World and Steam Punk from the MEGA Classic Set.

New animations, Parallax, and tilesets were added, and Steam Punk V2 has evolved industry.

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

NEONPIXEL: Mega Classic set includes two packs.

The first pack, called OLD WORLD 1800S PACK, takes you back to the 1800s, when trade was mainly done by sea and different powers competed for treasures. You can create small harbors and undiscovered islands with the assets provided in this pack.

The second pack, STEAMPUNK PACK, is not as extensive, but it still offers enough assets to create intriguing places that emanate the scent of steam and industry or are illuminated with vegetation!

●Update 2024/1/25

New animations, Parallax, and tilesets were added, and Steam Punk V2 has evolved industry.
